JWTPayload.description: Type of the payload of the json web token

UserLoginRequest.description: Type for the request to login a user

UserChangePasswordRequest.description: Type of the request to change the password of a user

UserForgotPasswordRequest.description: Type of the request to send a password reset link to a user

UserResetPasswordRequest.description: Type of the request to reset the password of a user

DepartmentPartialDto.description: Type of the partial department dto used for the member list

MemberPartialDto.description: Type of the partial member dto used for the member list

DepartmentMemberDto.description: Type of a member of a department (partial member with department information)

DirectorDto.description: Type of the director (partial member with department and role information)

StatusOverview.description: Type of the overview of the status of the different account creation operations

CreateMemberResponseDto.description: Type of the response after creating a member

CreateMemberRequestDto.description: Type of the request to create a member

UpdateDepartmentDto.description: Type of the request to update a department

MemberPermissionAssignmentDto.description: Type of the member permission asignment dto used for the permission page

DirectorPositionDto.description: Type of the director position dto

PermissionAssignmentDto.description: Type of the permission assignment (permission of a member or a director)

AssignPermissionToMemberRequestDto.description: Type of the request to assign a permission to a member

MemberStatusDto.description: Type of the member status dto

ItSkillDto.description: Type of the it skill dto

MemberDetailsDto.description: Type of the member details dto used for the member details page

InternalProjectDto.description: Type of the internal project of a member

TraineeChoiceDto.description: Type of the trainee choice of a member

TraineeMotivationDto.description: Type of the motivation of a trainee

UpdateVotingDeadlinesRequestDto.description: Type of the request to update the voting deadlines of a generation

TraineeAssignmentDto.description: Type of the assignment of a trainee to an internal project, mentor and department

TraineeProgressDto.description: Type of the trainee progress with the internal project milestones and mandatory workshops feedback

post.description: Sends an httpOnly cookie to the client and retrieves id, username and corresponding permissions

get.description: Sends the user data of the currently logged in user to the client

patch.description: Updates the passwordHash in the database if the old password is correct

post.description:
An email is sent with an password reset link and a key in the url to the user
The key used in the link is saved in the databse for the later verification
post.summary: Sends a password reset link to the user

patch.description:
The user can set a new password by entering their mailadress and a new password
The mail and the key in the url are then checked to se if it is a valid pair
If the pair is valid the new password is stored
patch.summary: Resets the password of a user

post.description: Logs the user out by removing the jwt from the cookie

get.description: Retrieves a list of all members

post.description:
Creates a new member in the database and creates accounts
for the different systems (exchange, mediawiki)

get.description:
Retrieves the image of a member with the given `id`.
Returns null with status code 204 if no image was found.

parameters.description: The id of the member to retrieve the image from
parameters.name: id

post.description: Saves the image of a member with the given `id`

parameters.description: The id of the member to save the image to
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves all members of the departments (this does not include the director of a department)
Retrieves all current directors (if query parameter `current` is true) or all directors

parameters.description: Query parameter to specify if only the current directors should be retrieved
parameters.name: current

patch.description:
Updates the status of an existing member
Update can be done by members with certain permission
Update can be done by member himself with an additional permission
patch.summary: Update the status of a member

parameters.description: The id of the member to update
parameters.name: id

requestBody.description: The new status of the member

schema.description: The new status of the member

get.description: Retrieves all departments

put.description: Updates the information of an existing department

parameters.description: The id of the department to update
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves the language values
Retrieves the edv skills
Retrieves all directors and members permission assignments
Retrieves name, description and ID of all permissions

Retrieves a member specified by id
Returns financial data iff member has permission or is himself

parameters.description: The id of the member to retrieve
parameters.name: id

patch.description:
Updates the information of an existing member. Update of critical fields can be done by member with certain permission.
Update of critical and non critical fields can be done by member himself with additional permission

parameters.description: The id of the member to update
parameters.name: id

requestBody.description: The new information of the member

schema.description: The new information of the member

get.description: Retrieves all current trainees
Retrieves a single internal project by id

put.description: Updates an internal project by id

get.description: Retrieves choices of mentor, internal project and department of all trainees of given generation
Retrieves information about all generations
Gets letter of motivation form trainees of given generation

requestBody.description: start and end date of the voting

schema.description: start and end date of the voting

patch.description: Sets choices of internesprojekt, mentor and department of member

get.description: Retrieves all internal projects of a generation

post.description: Adds a mentor to a generation

get.description: Retrieves all internal projects of a generation
Retrieves all current IPs
Retrieves all IPs
Retrieves all milestones of internal projects and workshop feedback of a generation
get.summary: Get progress of the trainee generation

post.description:
Admits a trainee which sets the active since state of the member to the current date and
updates the member status
